net.sf.excelutils

类 WorkbookUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.excelutils.WorkbookUtils

  • public class WorkbookUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    WorkbookUtils is a helper of Microsoft Excel,it's based on POI project

    版本:
    $Revision: 112 $ $Date: 2006-08-22 18:54:05 +0800 (星期二, 22 八月 2006) $
    作者:
    rainsoft

      • openWorkbook

        public static Workbook openWorkbook(javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx,
                    java.lang.String config)
                             throws ExcelException
        Open Excel File
        参数:
        ctx - ServletContext
        config - Excel Template Name
        返回:
        Workbook
        抛出:
        ExcelException

      • openWorkbook

        public static Workbook openWorkbook(java.lang.String fileName)
                             throws ExcelException

        fileName -
        返回:
        Workbook
        抛出:
        ExcelException
